tool_description:
Our real-time API provides science-backed high accuracy detection of sensitive images (pornography, nudity, sexuality, violence). We are constantly improving our API. Keywords: adult, porn, moderation, image validation, explicit, detection, NSFW.
Any questions: contact@octopale.com
name: Sensitive Image Detection
title: Sensitive Image Detection

api_list.name: Validate image by URL

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: Url of the image to be validated. Supported image formats: TIF, JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF.
